title: Turn on "hey google" announcement
content: Turn on "hey google" audio sound when "hey google" starts listening. It used to make a "ding" to let you know it answered and was ready for your statement. Now it is quite when you say "hey google" and you have to look at the screen to know if it is ready to listen. This is on a Samsung note9 phone.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
